up.fe.liacc.repacl.core

Class DF

  • java.lang.Object
    • up.fe.liacc.repacl.core.DF

  • public class DF
extends java.lang.Object
    This static class provides the Directory Facilitator Service and is used to send messages to agents and to keep a directory of all agents in the application. Agents use the static method send(ACLMessage) to send a message to one or more agents. The ACLMessage object contains the receiver agent and the sender (so the receiver can reply back).
    Author:
    joaolopes

      • getAgents

        Returns:

      • searchAgent

        public static Agent searchAgent(int aid)
        Search an agent with this AID.
        Parameters:
        aid -
        Returns:
        The agent mapped to this AID or null if this AID is not registered to any agent in the DF.

      • searchService

        public static Agent[] searchService(int service)
        Parameters:
        service -
        Returns:
        Returns the group of agents that provide a service. Basically it means the agent activated that behavior.

      • registerAgent

        public static int registerAgent(Agent agent)
        Registers the agent in the directory and returns its AID (freshly generated for it). If the agent is already registered, returns its current AID.
        Parameters:
        agent - The agent to be registered
        Returns:
        The AID generated for the agent.

      • unregisterAgent

        public static int unregisterAgent(Agent agent)
        Deregisters an agent from the DF and resets the agent's AID (sets its AID to -1).
        Parameters:
        agent -
        Returns:
        The old agent's AID if the agent was found in the DF or -1 otherwise.
